entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
